title: Tragui
description: A Kotlin-based Android application developed using Jetpack Compose, designed to help users find cocktails based on their chosen beverage type, offering an engaging and smooth user experience.

title: OfferHub
description: A Kotlin-based Android application that centralizes promotions by collecting offers from banks. Developed using Kotlin, this app allows users to track, filter, and stay up-to-date on personalized promotions all in one place.

title: The Big Walrus
description: A React-based Single Page Application designed for selling walrus NFTs. Built on the Solana blockchain, it features a sleek and responsive design for exploring and purchasing unique digital collectibles.
